<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.TriggerRule</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Use this script-include if you would like to make changes to this functionality, you can override functions defined in TriggerRuleSNC here. </description> <name>TriggerRule</name> <script><![CDATA[var TriggerRule = Class.create();

initialize: function() { TriggerRuleSNC.prototype.initialize.call(this); },
type: 'TriggerRule' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-02-26 16:59:49</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8d0a5886732220102eb52d2b04f6a79d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>TriggerRule</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="On-Call Scheduling" source="com.snc.on_call_rotation">37d4c9836de620100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8d0a5886732220102eb52d2b04f6a79d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-03-08 10:00:10</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>211</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
